channel.title: Android Note App
channel.description:
Well, just finished another android app. Unlike most of my others I was actually thinking of releasing this one to the market (others were more for personal use ex: android irc bot).
Before I do though I would like some user input on the app. So, if you have an android device of any type please test out this application and provide me with some feedback.
I would like to know about any bugs/glitches, problems, or ideas for anything else to be added.
Download at: http://www.mediafire.com/?rfzy6w0srxa51hj
Or use the Qr Code: [img]http://qrcode.kaywa.com/img.php?s=8&d=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mediafire.com%2F%3Frfzy6w0srxa51hj[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/iekt9t.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/29fy3ht.jpg[/img][img]http://i51.tinypic.com/nnw7yd.jpg[/img]
EDIT: Application has been officially released.
Name: Notepad
Developer: JohnZA

item.title: Android Note App
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

I can easily add the choice of text size, bold or italic, I’m not quite sure about colors though. I’ll look into that.

EDIT: Application has been officially released.

Name: Notepad

Developer: JohnZA

Read full topic

item.title: Android Note App
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:7, topic:360597”]It already does that[/quote]Oh ok cool.

Allow formatting? I know that’s pretty big, but just start simple with like bolding and colors.

Read full topic

item.title: Android Note App
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:5, topic:360597”]Forgot about that. Thanks[/quote]No problem

So besides that, I don’t see anything wrong with it.

If it doesn’t already, perhaps allow URLs to be automatically hyperlinked when typed in a certain format? Just an idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Android Note App
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:3, topic:360597”]The margin cannot be made bigger because the layout is done in xml. It can be centered, or be the way it is.

And yes as more notes appear you will be able to scroll through the list.[/quote]http://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/View.html#setPadding(int,%20int,%20int,%20int)

Read full topic

item.title: Android Note App
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

The margin cannot be made bigger because the layout is done in xml. It can be centered, or be the way it is.

And yes as more notes appear you will be able to scroll through the list.

Read full topic

item.title: Android Note App
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Just from looking at the pictures, I’d say give a little more margin between the text and the walls.

Also, what happens if you have overflow on the main note list page? Does a scroll arrow appear?

Read full topic
